title: How to Make Tomato and Fennel Soup

steps.headline: Cook the red onion in the olive oil in the pan until it has softened.
Add the garlic and fennel seed and cook for two minutes.
Add the fennel bulbs, tomatoes and stock.
Bring to a boil and simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

text: Cook the red onion in the olive oil in the pan until it has softened.  Add the garlic and fennel seed and cook for two minutes.  Add the fennel bulbs, tomatoes and stock.  Bring to a boil and simmer for 20 minutes.  Turn off the stove.  Stir in the tomato puree.  Season with salt and pepper to taste.  Blend in a food processor.  Cool.  Serve. Freeze any extra soup.
